Reviews.Title: “A nice stay”
Reviews.Author: ColumbusChow
Reviews.Content: The room is relatively small, but considered standard in hk. The owners of the hotel are friendly, helpful and nice. They recommend where to find good food. Tickets to some tourism spots such as Disneyland, ocean park, etc are available thru the hotel. The hotel room is clean and cozy. The location is perfect for eating good food and shopping. It's also near mrt station. It's 2 min walk to the bus stop taking you to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: Artscene
Reviews.Content: Friendly host and good location. Just a short taxi ride to the Airport Express Kowloon terminal. Very convenient shopping adn eating area. Just across the street from the Temple Street night market. It's a no frill with very small room, although I have seen even smaller ones elsewhere. Wifi works fine. My only complain is that it's not possible to book on line but you can call the hotel and reserve on an honour system. It does no give me a secure feeling. But so far the manager has been keeping my room until I come.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hospitality, close to MTR station, value-for-money”
Reviews.Author: LeeSK
Reviews.Content: For starters, I must say both Mr Chung are very accommodating and friendly. Greetings everytime we stepped into the hotel, recommended good places to dine, attended to our queries each time with a smile and they personally clean each rooms daily (bedsheets are clean, need not worry about bed bugs at all). The deluxe double room is reasonably sized for HK standard and bed is comfy (hard/firm mattress). Good location, 2 mins walking distance to the Jordon MTR station (exit C2), 2 mins to the covenience store (7-Eleven), 2 mins to our favourite dine-in-place (thanks to Mr Chung!). Note: Preferably to give them a call for room reservation.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, easy access, and friendly owner!”
Reviews.Author: CK G
Reviews.Content: This is by far the second smallest hotel in term of room size that I have ever stayed! But hey this is Hong Kong so who are we to complain? I think the room size can be considered average for Hong Kong! Great location, literally 2 mins from Jordan MTR station, a very plus is friendly owner that run the hotel by himself. Room is clean and fairly modern and well kept! Air conditioner did breakdown on the first night but it wasn't very hot and it was rectified the first thing in the morning! A clue, do not book online just call in to book. But there are only 9 rooms available but there is a sister hotel just a walk away so book early!

Reviews.Title: “I will definitely recommend this hotel to others!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Goh_2011
Reviews.Content: It was really a pleasant trip staying in Golden Wave Hotel. We've 6 people staying there from 23rd Aug - 27th Aug. Although we check in late but Mr. Chung still keep his promise reserved room for us. He and his brother are very friendly and helpful. I will surely recommend this hotel to others and will stay here again when I'm in Hong Kong. Thanks to both 钟先生!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, value for money and great service!”
Reviews.Author: Jenniferosy
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 7 days with 2 friends of mine. The hotel owners are friendly and provide good service! The room is small but we are ok with it. The toilet and room are very clean too. They will clean the room daily and it is safe to leave your belongings as we found that even when we left our hp or money, when we are back, our stuff is still there! You can ask the owner for places to eat as they are friendly and can recommend good and cheap places! I would go back again and also recommend to others!

HotelInfo.Name: Golden Wave Hotel Hong Kong
HotelInfo.Address: No.18-24 Jordan Road, Room C&D 3F Hongyun Building, Hong Kong, China
